name: Brave 0.12.3
notes: Added importing from other browsers. Added extension enhancements including auto-update, post-install downloads. Various fixes for Brave Payments, geolocation, toolbar, autofill, history, address bar, and per-site settings. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.12.3dev

name: Brave 0.12.1
notes: Added many languages. Added extension UI. Various fixes for Brave Payments, history, and password manager extensions. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/0.12.1dev

name: Brave 0.12.0
notes: Added option to allow for mixed-content. Added shortcut to view source. Various fixes for autofill, bookmarks, and history. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/0.12.0dev

name: Brave 0.11.6
notes: Added the ability to pay publishers with the Brave Ledger. Added autofill, bookmarks enhancements, find bar design update, and history. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/0.11.6dev

name: Brave 0.11.5
notes: Stability and minor bug fixes. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.5dev

name: Brave 0.11.4
notes: More data clearing options, tab page previews, printing fix on Windows, memory leak fixes, crash fixes and more: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.4dev

name: Brave 0.11.3
notes: PDF, zoom, URL bar fixes, and libchromiumcontent 52.0.2743.116. Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.3dev

name: Brave 0.11.2
notes: Long tap history on back button, search shortcuts like 'yt cat videos', tab and nav cloning,  and much more: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.2dev

name: Brave 0.11.1
notes: PDF viewing, more data clearing options, navigator.registerProtocolHandler support, copy image option and more: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.1dev

name: Brave 0.11.0
notes: LastPass support, WebRTC fingerprinting protection, Flash click to play if Flash is enabled, and more: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.0dev

name: Brave 0.10.4
notes: Autocomplete, new suggestions UX, experimental Flash support and more: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/v0.10.4dev

name: Brave 0.10.3
notes: Update to libchromiumcontent 51.0.2704.84

name: Brave 0.10.2
notes: Crash fix for Windows with some link types.

name: Brave 0.10.1
notes: Fingerprint protection in the Bravery panel and various fixes. Full notes: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/v0.10.1dev

name: Brave 0.10.0
notes: Per site Bravery panel, error pages, and much more. Full detail: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.10.0dev

name: Brave 0.9.6
notes: Chromium 50.0.2661.102 and various bug fixes. Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.9.6dev

name: Brave 0.9.5
notes: Spell check, script blocking similar to NoScript, and much more. Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.9.5dev

name: Brave 0.9.4
notes: Startup fix if profile dir does not exist

name: Brave 0.9.3
notes: Dashlane support, external protocol handling, permission prompts, Chromium 50.0.2661.86, and more

name: Brave 0.9.2
notes: Windows 32-bit support, Windows default browser handling, fingerprinting protection, zoom fixes, multi language support, printing fix, and more. Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.9.2dev

name: Brave 0.9.1
notes: Various fixes. Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.9.1dev

name: Brave 0.9.0
notes: 1Password support, malware protection, phishing protection and more.  Details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.9.0dev

name: Brave 0.8.3
notes: Downloads manager, downloads toolbar, passwords manager, and more. Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.8.3dev

name: Brave 0.8.2
notes: Password saving, single instance app, more HTTPS Everywhere info, full screen mode fixes, and more.  More details here: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.8.2dev

name: Brave 0.8.1
notes: Security updates, basic HTTP auth support, and more. Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.8.1dev

name: Brave 0.8.0
notes: Bookmark management, bookmark importing, history for url bar, permissions dialogs and lots more.  Full details https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.8.0dev

name: Brave 0.7.16
notes: Various fixes and optimizations, full notes here: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.7.16dev

name: Brave 0.7.15
notes: Bookmarks toolbar, bookmarks manager, optimizations, bug fixes, and crash fixes. Full release notes at: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.7.15dev

name: Brave 0.7.14
notes: Added security sandbox for content processes, various UI perf optimizations, bug fixes, and more. Full details:  https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.7.14dev

name: Brave 0.7.13
notes: Preferences tab added, third party cookie blocking and referrer blocking, various keyboard shortcuts added, context menu fixes, 2 finger swipe navigation for OSX. and much more. Full release notes: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.7.13dev

name: Brave 0.7.12
notes: Various crash fixes and window.opener fixes, various keyboard shortcut fixes, and much more. Full release notes here: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.7.12dev

name: Brave 0.7.11
notes: Fixed a security issue, added Windows shortcuts, fixed site loading problems, and a lot more.  Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases

name: Brave 0.7.10
notes: Added hamburger menu, fixed Windows packaging issues, Windows black window problem, and fixed various in-content problems.   Release notes: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.7.10dev

name: Brave 0.7.9
notes: UI tweaks, adblock bug fix, left and right nav keyboard shortcuts, and better privacy. Full details at https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.7.9dev

name: Brave 0.7.8
notes: New UI, various features, and various fixes. Full details at https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.7.8

name: Brave 0.7.7
notes: Fixed load time indicator and Windows menus

name: Brave 0.7.6
notes: Turning blocking ads off, now also turns off insertions.  Fix for no updates available on Windows. Toggle bookmarks fix.

name: Brave 0.7.5
notes: Fix link navigation sometimes not working, Facebook login fix, fix a case of adblock/TP/https-everywhere not working, fix for auto update UI appearing for background checks.

name: Brave 0.7.4
notes: Enable / disable https everywhere, adblock, and tracking protection from the menus.

name: Brave 0.7.3
notes: Added UI for checking updates, downloading updates, no updates, release notes, and errors.  Removed some bad auto-suggest URLs (not all bad ones yet).

name: Brave 0.7.2
notes: Clicking on links when we are the default browser now works, more fixes for multi window filtering

name: Brave 0.7.1
notes: Possible fix for websites not loading, fix for undoing closed tabs from session store, menu fixes
Popup window fixes, new update UI, HTTPS Everywhere fixes, more menu work.
name: Brave 0.7.0

notes: Tab previews and loading indicators per tab
name: Brave 0.0.6

notes: Tracking protection and ad block
name: Brave 0.0.5

notes: persistent session state, pinned sites, other minor bug fixes
name: Brave 0.0.4

notes: Release notes for v0.0.3
name: Brave 0.0.3

notes: Release notes
name: Brave 0.0.2
